Articles.Content:
what are radiators and thermal control systems used for?

do they protect you from radiation when you are in space or just cool the parts they are attached to?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-28T20:18:52Z" title="07/28/2015 08:18  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 28, 2015</time> by Cannon**
they cool the parts they are attached to and possibly even attract the heat from some parts further. Radiation isn't a thing in KSP (yet?)
